sn35.125:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vajjīsu viharati hatthigāme.
sn35.125:4.2: Atha kho uggo gahapati hatthigāmako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.125:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho uggo gahapati hatthigāmako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.125:4.5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti?
sn35.125:4.6: Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti?
sn35.125:4.8: “Ayaṃ kho, gahapati, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti.
